shapecode_3_g=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_a2=0.000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dec=pow(.98,60/fps);
per_frame_2=num0=numbeat*(abs(num-num_att)+pump)+bnot(numbeat)*num0;
per_frame_3=pump=numbeat*(sin(t)*.1+.1)+bnot(numbeat)*pump;
per_frame_4=pump=pump*dec;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=num_b0=num_b;
per_frame_7=num=abs((bass-bass_att)+(mid-mid_att)+(treb-treb_att));
per_frame_8=num_att=num_att*.95+num*.05;
per_frame_9=num_b=above(num,1-pump)*above(abs(num-num_att),num0);
per_frame_10=numbeat=bnot(equal(num_b0,num_b));
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=t=t+(num-pump)*(1-dec);
per_frame_13=bc=bc+numbeat;
per_frame_14=bass_flow=bass_flow+3*abs(bass-bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_15=mid_flow=mid_flow+3*abs(mid-mid_att)/fps;
per_frame_16=treb_flow=treb_flow+3*abs(treb-treb_att)/fps;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=wave_r=.5+.5*sin(bass_flow+t*1.02);
per_frame_19=wave_g=.5+.5*sin(treb_flow+t*1.14);
per_frame_20=wave_b=.5+.5*sin(mid_flow+t*1.21);
per_frame_21=wave_mystery=wave_mystery+.5*sin(t*2.72+time);
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=q1=t;
per_frame_24=q2=bc;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+.1*rad;
per_pixel_2=rot=sin(q1+0.5*q2)*(1.1-zoom);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main,lerp(uv,uv_orig,0.3))*0.98);
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_8=`    ret *= 0.97; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_9=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    //rotation code by geiss, mods by me
comp_4=`    float2 uv2, uv3;
comp_5=`    float ang2, c, s;
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    uv -= 0.5;
comp_8=`    uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    ang2 = 1.57;
comp_11=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_12=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_13=`    uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_14=`    uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    ang2 = 4.71;
comp_17=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_18=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_19=`    uv3.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_20=`    uv3.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_21=`
comp_22=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.5).xyz;
comp_23=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv2 + 0.5).zxy);
comp_24=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv3 + 0.5).yzx);
comp_25=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,(1-uv)+0.5).zyx);
comp_26=`
comp_27=`    ret *= 1.3;
comp_28=`    ret*=pow(hue_shader,4);
comp_29=`    ret+=(GetBlur1(uv+0.5)+GetBlur1(uv2+0.5).zxy+GetBlur1(uv3+0.5).yzx+GetBlur1(uv*float2(-1,-1)+0.5).zyx)/4;
comp_30=`    ret*=dot(ret,hue_shader.zxy);
comp_31=`}
